extendedInfo.description: Card Shark includes a diverse and growing collection of solitaire and traditional card games. Card Shark features the ability to install custom tables, card backs, and even card fronts. Supported games include: Klondike (Classic Solitaire), FreeCell, Canfield, Basic Rummy, Gin Rummy, Rummy 500, Spider Solitaire, Cruel Solitaire, Beleaguered Castle, Spiderette, Hearts, Memory Match (Concentration), Speed Match, Calculation, Forty Thieves, Euchre (US), Deuces Wild and Jacks or Better Draw Poker, Aces Up, Spades (non-partnership variant), Limit Texas Hold 'Em, Speed, Batsford Solitaire, Josephine, Red & Black, Sea Towers, Crazy Eights, Tripeak, Golf, Eagle Wing, Pyramid, Old Maid, War, Go Fish, 13 Packs (aka Grandma's Game), Royal Cotillion, Blackjack (21), Royal Parade, Thieves of Egypt, Scorpion, Pile On, Montana, Canfield, Clock Solitaire, Kings Corner, Russian Cell, Yukon, I Doubt It, Four Seasons, Crescent, Osmosis (aka Treasure Trove), Canasta, La Belle Lucie. 60 games and counting! Card Shark combines a silky smooth 3d presentation with tasteful animation, sounds, and an elegant drag-drop interface that has been lovingly fine-tuned for the touch screen. Touches and drag targets are forgiving, and piles are automatically split following completed gestures. Touch foundation piles to automatically complete a game. Why clutter your device with separate card games, when you can stock it with a quality collection that continues to be expanded and improved regularly based on user requests? Features include: - layouts for left/right handed stock placement - infinite undo/redo supported in all solitaire variants - tap foundation to autoplay cards - hold 'undo' button two seconds to restart deals - does not interfere with ipod background music - automatically saved/resumed games & statistics - multiple cards fronts, backs, and tables with ability to install new ones from your photo library or the support site An online FAQ is available through the in-game help system. This answers common questions about the supported games and offers a sneak peak at features and new games slated for the next update. Card Shark also includes a handy contact author button that makes it easy to submit requests. "Out of all of the solitaire type card games I have tried, this one is by far the best I have come across in quite a long while." - www.geardiary.com Featured as an outstanding app in Wired Magazine's 2011 App Guide!

reviews.title: So well done
reviews.comment: This app has every card game I can remember. The hearts is done perfectly, no darkening of the cards I can\'t use, I hate it when other apps do that to you... And the cards are in the correct, ms windows order  The rummy 500 is excellent too
reviews.author: Heather Melling

reviews.title: Best card app ever
reviews.comment: Buy it. Now. You won\'t need another card app ever again.
reviews.author: Benjamin Griffes

reviews.title: Games
reviews.comment: Great card app, has all the games. I enjoy this app a lot
reviews.author: Susan Plummer

reviews.comment: Love it
reviews.author: Kerrey Black

reviews.title: Best Euchre App
reviews.comment: Hands down the best Euchre app for Android. Very well worth the $3, more card games than I know how to play, great customization, excellent buy.
reviews.author: Mike Porter

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is a great app and has soo many games, even ones I\'ve never heard of! It\'s great 4 passing the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: What ever was wrong fixed its self! Love the game great way to pass time waiting for appointments.\tLove the game, to bad it stopped working after a few days!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love this app! Lots of different games and you can choose which are your favorites! The only thing is that it doesn\'t always save the spot where you left off! I\'ll stop in the middle of one game and it\'ll go back to a few runs I had played already!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Loved this app until the update today. It is completely unplayable now on my incredible 4g. Please fix this! Update... All better! Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tons of games, but needs in game options.
reviews.comment: The games available are great and so is the game play.  However, certain games need options to change since there are always different rules and ways to play every game.  For example President won\'t allow you to play 2 aces on another 2 aces.  I\'ve never heard of it being played that way, but it could be easily switched with an in game option.
reviews.author: Greg Kramp

reviews.title: Euchre
reviews.comment: Ok I was starting to not feel SO bad for spending $3.00 on this game then, it happened. I was playing my ultimate favorite card game euchre, trump was clubs, computer played a ace of clubs I had a jack of spades and the game DID NOT acknowledge one of the BASIC rules of euchre that the bowers change back and forth.....SMH.... I\'m now regretting spending $3.00 on a game that doesn\'t recognize basic rules of games.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Philip
reviews.comment: Stopped working today. Tells me to contact the author. Not good enough.

reviews.comment: In Casino only the simplest builds are implemented, adding 1 card from your hand to one pile on the board.
